# CKRecord.SystemType

**Enumeration**

Possible values for record types of system records.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SystemType
```

## Types of System Records

- **share**: A string that represents the record type for CloudKit share records.
- **userRecord**: A string that represents the record type for CloudKit user records.

## Accessing the Record’s Metadata

- **recordID**: The unique ID of the record.
- **recordType**: The value that your app defines to identify the type of record.
- **creationDate**: The time when CloudKit first saves the record to the server.
- **creatorUserRecordID**: The ID of the user who creates the record.
- **modificationDate**: The most recent time that CloudKit saved the record to the server.
- **lastModifiedUserRecordID**: The ID of the user who most recently modified the record.
- **recordChangeTag**: The server change token for the record.
- **CKRecord.ID**: An object that uniquely identifies a record in a database.
